content.detailedDescription: There was a full moon that night i took pictures of the moon which was thru my trees along with taking pictures of what i  aught to show it won't the moon it squiggly flashed line turned stopped into the biggest brightest orb i've ever seen stayed still kind of pulsing then took off in a different shapes i managed to catch it leaving and arriving as well as stationary6over my old house i have sat on them forever not knowing where to send them
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saved these pics it was incredible i've witnessed things before but first time i caught

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling on 85s at about 11pm i looked up and saw something flying. it was star showoff similar to a drone
 it had a steady yellow and green light and a bright white light. i felt likr i saw something unknown
 my reaction was like "wow, what was that? we was on the express way and unable to stop.
content.summary: Looked like it could be grey or black, it had maybe 4 star like things.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were sitting on our back patio at about 10:32 p.M. on thursday, july 7, 2016. we were enjoying the warm evening outside and my he was looking toward the southeast sky when he caught a very quick bright flash. about 1 second later there was the same bright flash & trail, however this object had jumped an incredible distance. he quickly pointed this out to me and i witnessing the same event with 3 more quick flashes followed by a huge jump forward. this was not a solid light, it was a bright flash, leaving a very dim trail. the flash and distance traveled were perfectly in-sink with the same trajectory. we can't say how far it traveled as we have no idea the on the objects size or altitude. if i had to guess, i'd say it was jumping thousands of miles each flash. this guess is based on my professional aerospace expertise and my husbands knowledge of watching satellites, jets and the iss crossing the sky. there was 1 more distant flash as it traveled northeast and went out of our line of sight. you literally had to be looking directly toward the area at the start in order to see the event. i can say for certain, this was a high altitude object traveling at an unfathomable speed.
some observations: 
1)it was not a solid light
2)no fuselage was ever visible
3)there were no sounds or booms 
4)without seeing the 5-6 quick flashes, it wouldn't have been seen
5)the flash lasted a microsecond 
6)like a metronome, the flash and the distance traveled were perfectly in-sink 
7)it was on the same trajectory with no deviations
8)there was no break up or change of course
9)the object went across the entire plane of the sky in 6-8 seconds
10)it was not traveling down or up
11)we had a clear unobstructed view of the entire cloudless sky
content.summary: Light which jumped every second covering the entire visible plane of the sky in 6-8 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south on hwy 95 toward las vegas and at 2:55a near mile marker ny 41 between 1 and 2 o'clock from my vantage point, i saw a red lead light followed by two white trailing lights even with each other (shaped like a chevron) defending at a rapid speed (similar to that of a meteor falling) it was located about 15 to 29 degrees above the horizon (roughly 4,000 ft) and during its decent it made a left 90 degree turn then a right 90 degree turn till it reached roughly 500 ft. the total duration of the sighting was less than a second. at 3:00a still on hwy 95 heading south near mile markers ny 36 and ny 35 a bright flash lite up the sky like a lightening strike which originated above my windshield vantage point still in the general 1 to 2 o'clock direction basically in a direction from where the defending lights would have come from earlier but at a much higher altitude. 
the weather was clear (not a cloud in the sky), visibility was high, no other vehicles were near me in the road in either direction, no street lights or ither near by lights were present as to lead to any type of reflection, nothing in my windshield obstructing my view.
content.summary: Two white trail lights with one red lead light descended meteor speed then changed direction twice then disappeared shortly 5 minutes later lighting lite up sky but no clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting the "show" of the special bridges in san pietroburgo

i saw a red object flying very fast in the sky...No lights as an airplane...

the object stopped in the sky and it was so far away and little...And totally black after the fly...But in the camerasight it was changing shape and something was going in, out and around it...

my wife told me to stop it to talk about it...And no more photo...
content.summary: I thought it was a solid shape by eyes...And then...The pictures show something else

content.detailedDescription: Ocorreu dia 30/06/2016, por volta de 08h30m, em localidade conhecida por lago grande, municã­pio de santarã©m, no estado do parã¡, brasil. aluna em trabalho de campo do curso de professores da universidade federal do oeste do parã¡, pesquisando sobre pesca familiar, fotografou barco que passava prã³ximo ao que estava. essa foto foi tirada com celular pessoal, com resoluã§ã£o baixa. a foto foi enviada para a orientadora que me mostrou. indagada sobre o acontecimento, a autora da foto disse nã£o ter observado qualquer tipo de aeronave(aviã£o, helicã³ptero) ou qualquer tipo de balã£o, afirmando inclusive que nã£o haviam pã¡ssaros por perto. o dia estava claro e ensolarado, com poucas nuvens. que sã³ notou os pontos que aparecem na foto depois de ter sido questionada.Mesmo assim gostaria de uma anã¡lise por parte da mufon.
content.summary: Escuro, ligeiramente ovalado, com pequenas asas, sem ruidos

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were outside i was smoking a cigarette we both like to look up at the stars at night we saw what we thought was probably a satellite but it was moving way faster and it was brighter than normal and then all the sudden as we're watching it i swear what looked like a plasma shot out the back of it and it accelerated at an extremely fast pace and it didn't turn but it changed its angle not very much   wasn't  wasn't a shooting star or something of that nature i've seen those plenty of them and we saw that happen 3 times successively i'd say 4 seconds apart from each other and then this object was i mean it was moving and it was getting closer towards the end of your sight and it gets bright  one more time right before it  disappeared or the light went out i don't know it just turned off i couldn't see the light  anymore
content.summary: Extremely fast "star like" object afterburner visibly turned tail end into plasma

content.detailedDescription:
I was between the age of 8-9yrs old, i still remember it as if it had just happened. when i used to go to my grandma’s farm in baltic, ct during the summer. my family would help on the farm and stay till late and then my mom would drive my sisters and me home. one night, she parked her car along my grandma’s long driveway about 17 yards away from the house and where there was no lighting, because my aunts and uncles had taken up the parking spaces closer to the house. just as she started the car a large circular flying aircraft flew from the direction where the mohegan sun country club is now and then stopped right above our car and just hovered, it seemed like forever. 
my sisters and i never told anyone for fear they would call us crazy or just wouldn't believe us because of our age at the time, but are mom was the one who noticed it 1st as she seen it flying toward us and told us to get down on the floor so they don't see us, but as i crouched down i couldn't help to look. remember being scared and amazed at how huge it was and all the lights going around the edge of it. i honestly thought it was cool as i watched it. my mom looked terrified. i don't know how long exactly it lasted but it stayed there for quite some time. 
i am telling my story now, in hopes to see if anyone back then seen anything similar like us. given my age that would be between 1978-1979 
(telling my age, lol) 
but anyhow back to what happened. i didn't fall asleep but for the life of me i think we lost some time cus the next thing i remember was standing outside the car a little further down the driveway near my grandma’s barn going towards the woods and seeing a glowing whitish person walking towards me and then being back in my mom’s car and watching it fly off very fast in the direction towards downtown baltic like it was flying in a southeastern direction. i don't recall how i got out the car or getting back in to be honest or the length of time it all was but it felt like hours had gone by. and my family never wanted to talk about it.
i have always wondered about the lost time but shrugged it off. questioning if what i remembered truly happened? but now i'm a little nervous seeing articles and videos where some people have under gone past life regression and had a similar experience of lost time and found out that they had been abducted. i'm not saying my life been peaches n cream but that would scare the life out of me to find that out. i'm undecided what to do. hopefully someone will see this post and has had a similar sighting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: My mom started the car a large circular flying aircraft flew from the direction where the mohegan sun country club is now and then stopped right above our car and just hovered, it seemed like forever.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? 
i was outside at looking nnw at 8:50pm and saw a white orb or light at 15 degrees off the horizon at roughly 15-20 miles distance.

2. what made you first notice the object? 
it was out of place in the sky for what first looked like a commercial airliner from 15 miles away.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? 
a commercial airliner. 

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. 
object was either in a dead hover or slowly flying directly at me. it was too far away to know which it was. ir appeared stationary for about 15 seconds or so then started to accelerate and kept on accelerating heading due w at 4 to 5 times the speed of a commercial airliner. 

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. 
no feelings or reactions except noticing its acceleration rate was beyond any winged object flying at that low an altitude without bursting into a ball of flames.

6. how did you lose sight of the object? 
lost sight of it from a long building blocking my view.
content.summary: 8:50pm looking nnw and saw an white object out of place in the sky and in its acceleration.

content.detailedDescription:
On june 15, 2016, my wife and myself attended the mufon orange county (mufon oc) chapter meeting. we were there to hear mufon oc's guest speaker yvonne smith. ms. smith is the founder of an experiencer support group (cero) that she started in 1991. 

after the lecture, a group of people who attended the event decided to grab a bite to eat. the group tried a few restaurants but due to circumstances beyond our control, my wife and i had to leave. it was close to 1am in the morning. we both had to work the next day including taking our children to school.

we jumped on the 73 toll road heading southbound. as we were approaching the jamboree road onramp/offramp, i thought i observed a grey alien or the outline of a grey alien with it's arms raised in the number 1 lane on the freeway. in the dash cam video included with this report, you will hear me exclaim at the 8 second mark "what the heck is that in the road?!?!" i felt foolish right afterwards so i decided not follow up with my wife. i believe i was thinking i must be really tired to have seen an alien standing in the highway with both arms raised in the air.

after that, my wife and i banter back and forth about me not liking onions (i haven't liked them since i was a little kid) and i am not a fan of mcdonalds either. we ended up at the drive-thru for a local mcdonalds before jumping on the toll road. 

as we started coming out of a bend near macarthur blvd. onramp/offramp (1 minute mark on video), i noticed a strange series of blinking lights hovering very low on the west side of the toll road. the lights blinked on/off in unison and were all red colored. there also was a smaller pair of blue/white lights that did not blink; just remained constantly lit. the red blinking lights, approximately 4-5 of them, seemed to hang down vertically. they reminded me of a string of xmas tree lights.

the lights then appeared to slowly move westward, hover, continue to move west and then descend. the object was moving very slowly. i was driving so i did not have a good view all the time as i had to keep the vehicle under control. my wife had a better view and was able to capture a small video on her samsung galaxy note 5 mobile phone. she actually thought the object was going to land. however, our views become obstructed due to a hill upgrade on the road and a wall that is parallel to the road. based on the dash cam video, the object appears to between macarthur blvd and bonita canyon drive; hovering right above a residential area too. 

at the 1:40 mark on the video, a strange fast moving object is observed travelling from south to north down the left side of my vehicle. both my wife and myself did not see this until we retrieved the video from our dash cam. it is right above the road and is moving extremely fast. it may be a bird or an insect but we are not sure.

now, i as i am driving i am thinking to myself i should exit and go check this thing out. but something compels me not too. in fact, i felt a strange sense of giddiness while all this was happening, like i was drunk or something, and to just keep on driving. when i heard my voice on the video, i realized something was not right with me. i just sound different other than my normal self when i speak; kind of lackadaisical. 

i am not saying this is an extraterrestrial aircraft but i can rule out a couple things. it's not a jet aircraft based on the flight characteristics i observed (unless it was a vtol and i highly doubt that). it could be a helicopter but i've never seen a helicopter with this type of navigation light configuration. in addition, john wayne airport ceases flight operations at 10pm for departures and 11pm arrivals (mon - sat). so if this is object is man made it was operating after the airport closes which would be in violation of the local noise abatement rules. as i above-mentioned, if it was a helicopter i can only come to the conclusion it belonged to the orange county sheriff's dept. that being said, i've seen the sheriff's helicopter fly at night, similar low altitude, and it looks nothing like what i witnessed this night. not even close.
content.summary: Strange blinking lights observed

content.detailedDescription: Laying in my bed looking out the window that was facing my town the light seemed larger then a comet.
content.summary: Comet

content.detailedDescription: We were on the beach to watch the fireworks. as they began we saw the object come from the south following the shore line then stopping directly overhead. there were two red lights in the front and green lights in the back. it pivoted then moved east, then pivoted again and moved north to just above where the fireworks were exploding. it appeared to sit there and observe the light show. it moved several times during the fireworks display, changing direction. it moved south and appeared to stop while a helicopter passed by at a lower level then moved again. it stayed to the south for about five minutes and then returned to the fireworks, just to the east of where they were exploding. it made no sound and at one point seemed to change from red lights to gold. as the fireworks came to an end it moved south again and seemed to descend until it disappeared over the ocean. we saw another similar object in the sky to the south, but never observed it moving.This object did not move like a plane or helicopter, made no sound and was able to pivot in one place. we did not feel threatened, it just appeared to be observing the fireworks as we were.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Happened while watching fireworks. the object had red light in the front, green in the back. came from the south, then stopped over us, continued to over the fireworks. changed direction, moved then hovered, then moved again. appeared to be observing..

content.detailedDescription:
I actually saw one hovering well above the hillish/mountainish tops of saint thomas, virgin islands while on a boat traveling west from saint johns back towards saint thomas right at dusk. my lady friend and i both witnessed this disc/oval-shaped craft with strobing lights for nearly the entire 20 minute boat ride. it never moved and we could clearly see no structure beneath the craft as there was still some light just above the mountain tops and well below this ufo. we witnessed this right when hurricane katrina was landing on new orleans in august 2005. so, once we got closer to the shore of st. thomas island the mountainish landscape obstructed a better view because i imagine the craft was set further back above the island. the one regret i have is not bringing binoculars and/or a telephoto camera lens. 



regarding human abduction (not mine as it never happened to me): 
what i think is happening has much to do with david paulides missing 411 reports combined with the nearly 1680 dumbs worldwide. 
it is probably a combination of both, some people being taken up into spacecrafts and/or also many taken well below underground where it is said human cloning operations/life-extension technology is said to be going on; i.E. a.I. super computer assisted holographic soul/consciousness transferring into age-accelerated clone look-a-likes and/or randoms. its life-extension technology that the super wealthy and well connected political elites are now being told they too can have as never before for a large price; e.G. much money and/or the selling out of humanity via the eugenics-based human depopulation endgame. keep in mind the eugenic's based stonehenge-like georgia guidestones monument with its number one recommendation etched in granite written in 8 different languages in tandem with the unesco treaty un agenda-21/up-dated 2030 agenda 2.0 .. also search philip schneider and paul hellyer with what they have to say regarding grey aliens living underground and many other various species of et's.  
now combine all that i mentioned with the fact that the hubble udf scan has observed 176 billion galaxies while most top astronomy scientists now speculate many-many other earth-like (hell) planets (the up-coming 2018 james webb infrared space telescope is expected to find over one trillion other galaxies). i said "hell" planets because this is where we all come to suffer accordingly as our "cause and effect" karma debt would have it via absolute "truth" soul-consciousness heaven courtroom review, absolute heaven courtroom judgement, absolute heaven courtroom karma-debt based justice, absolute heaven courtroom sentencing/reincarnation. 
look up mandela effect and how philip k dick realized that this is quite possibly something he tapped into in order to write all those sci-fi novels in which many of them became big box office movies successes.


﻿
"a complete macrobiotic yin yang philosophic understanding combined with its practical dietary discipline is timeless universal law. all other teachings are incomplete." ~ michio kushi & george ohsawa.

content.detailedDescription: Well, i drive up and down the 528 daily. i live in orlando and work in merritt island. lately i have been seeing strange entities in the sky. i have not thought much of it, because the sky is clearer in merritt than orlando. but the other night i noticed what looked like a star, but it was red. so i just assumed that it was mars. then on the morning of the 4th, i noticed a bright star. it was around 5:40am(and driving on 528, close to the coast), so the sun was coming up, but i noticed what seemed to be a star, but much bigger. then within 30 seconds it disappeared. i told one of the other managers about it, and thought nothing of it. but when i was on my way home on the 6th i noticed something even stranger. i was on the 528 heading west, must have been between 8/8:30pm, and was on the southbound ramp to the 417 where i can see towards the direction of our airport, i saw what looked like a sun, in the clouds, at first i thought it was our sun then quickly realized that it was just about sunset. what was most strange, it had another orb or body by it. almost as if was a satellite of some sort orbiting it.  it was less than a 10th of the main orb, but when i tried to stop, to take a photo it was gone. i know we have a lot of secret military instillations in florida, but this did not look man made. hopefully someone else saw it. thank you, ric.
content.summary: It looked like another sun but smaller

content.detailedDescription: I had just returned to our cottage on lac barnes, val des monts, around midnight. the night was warm and the sky was clear, so i went down to the dock for some stargazing. within a couple of minutes i saw it, first almost directly overhead, travelling west. it was not familiar. it was about the same brightness as a dim star. much much too fast for an airplane. too slow for and not as bright as a meteor, plus it was pulsing on and off. it was visible for only about 3-4 seconds before disappearing close to the western horizon (hilly terrain). i was puzzled because i am familiar with what meteors, aircraft, and satellites (saw 2 south to north in the next half hour) look like. i asked myself if it was something lower in the sky that had tricked me, but concluded that it was almost certainly a high fast object.
content.summary: Object was travelling very fast. it appeared a short streaks as if a light on and off. much too fast for a plane or satellite, too slow for a meteor

content.detailedDescription:
On february 29th  2016 i flew from atlanta to los angeles with delta flight 1855
i was looking out of the window and at first saw some very intense lights
then realized that they are 3 and are hovering between to mountain rims.
i think we where at least 10 miles away.
i took a series of pictures.
the objects remained motionless and seemed to hide between the mountains.
they remained motionless until i lost sight.
first i thought this are some natural lights but then why would someone light up something that bright in the middle of the day? 
also they where big really big and then i realized that they are off ground
content.summary: Midflight from atlanta to los angeles

content.detailedDescription: while observing fireworks in clearing, saw off to far left what appeared as stars pulsating and flashing blue and red randomly.One at far left slowly decended to below tree line. about one minute later it reappeared above tree line, slowly acendind in straight line back to original point. object at right also slowly decended in straight line but not as far, then ascended back to original  sighting. both objects hovered about 20 minutes then repeated same behavior.There were 10 or 12 witnesses i am aware of. all this was taking place during the fireworks display so i had to choose what i wanted to look at, going back and forth between the fireworks and the objects. the fireworks lasted from about 2015 to 2100 hrs. the objects repeated the same behavior about every 20minutes throughout the show. the wind was blowing the smoke from the fireworks left toward the objects. the smnoke was closer in altitude to us and did not seem to obstruct our view of the objects after the fireworks finalle, the objects were gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: While observing fireworks,saw sstar slowly decend below tree line thenaccend back to original point

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home watching a lightning storm. we saw a light appear through the storm clouds and at first glance we thought it was a star, but then it started to move upwards as if on a straight line.  the line was so straight, it was unusual and we began taking photos.

then, at approximately 75 degrees above the horizon, the star-like object, stopped and 3 lightning type bolts emanated from the object (straight down and one to the left and to the right, perfectly spaced).  this lightning was unusual and different than the storm.  the storm's lightning did cross over this object after the 3 bolts of lightning.

at that point, the star-like object descended in a straight line towards the horizon (the same trajectory that it went up, moments before), when the star-like object was no longer in view.  

pictures attached (more available than 5 provided).
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object star-shared appeared, flew in a straight line up in the atmosphere, then 3 rockets of lightning, then it moved directly down to horizon and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was fairly young when i witnessed this; probably about 7 years old. i remember the event very distinctly and what i did during/after the sighting. i believe i must have been on a break from school or it was a weekend, because this event occurred during the late morning. i should also mention that the weather was bright and sunny (i can't remember if there were any clouds or not).

the sighting occurred just outside my home. i was walking around my house, and had been walking from the kitchen area into the living room. there is a large window in the living room that looks out over a clearing where a small pond sits. i liked looking out at that part of the property, so i turned my head to look out at the pond. 

just to be clear, the clearing is about 125 ft across and is surrounded by trees on all sides, save for the side my house is on. the treeline is probably about 55 or 60 ft tall ( with some variation).

when i looked out, i thought i had noticed something moving among the trees in the northern part of the clearing. i stopped and stared out towards it. 

i thought that it was a shiny, metallic balloon when i first saw it. it made no sound whatsoever- if i hadn't been walking by at that moment, i probably wouldn't have seen it. at first, it was hidden behind some trees, but it slowly started to come into better view out of the trees. i was viewing it at a distance of about 100 ft. it was fairly large, approximately 12 or 13 feet across, and about 4 feet tall. it hovered around 30 or 40 feet above the ground, and was slowly making its way south at a rate of about 2 or 3 mph. it was moving very slowly. the object itself looked like a flying saucer. i couldn't see the bottom of it, as it was almost parallel to my line of sight. the saucer had three 'steps' to it. the surface was totally featureless and looked like it was made out of a really shiny, reflective metal. i couldn't even tell if it was spinning or not- there were no features or markings on the object. the whole thing looked like it was cast from a single piece of metal, no seams or bolts. 

after watching it for a few seconds, i got really excited. i had never seen a ufo before and wasn't really scared or anything, so i ran back into the kitchen to try to find a camera that is usually in a small storage cabinet. i couldn't find it... i started yelling for my mom to look out over the pond- and she could hear me. unfortunately, she was attending my brother, who needed vitamins, and told me she would be finished with him in a minute. not knowing what to do, i ran back to the living room and continued to watch it as it slowly made it's way south. i was not observing it for about 20 seconds. 

i've asked my mother about the event and she recalls me yelling to get her attention, but she did not actually look out over the pond to witness anything. 

i lost sight of the object when it started to reenter the treeline at the southern end of the clearing. i must've watched for another minute or two until i couldn't see it anymore. i didn't go outside to investigate further- the thought never crossed my mind.

i have always been really curious about what had happened back then, and so i've finally come to the decision to make a report on this. 

while i did not check to see any effects on the vegetation as a kid, i should mention that the forest is quite thick near my house: any straight path that an object of that size would try to follow would be bound to intercept trees somewhere. i don't remember any trees moving or being touched/affected by the object as it made its path. 

on the making of this report, i decided to look at the trees around where i thought the craft may have touched the trees... i couldn't find anything abnormal.
content.summary: Silver, mirror-like disc seen slowly hovering from north to south at a pace of about 2-3 mph

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I love to be outside, my porch is how i can enjoy that, so i do.We are in the flight path of some aircraft heading into dayton international some miles away as well as traffic for wright patterson afb i see etc.I often watch as  used to fly when i could.
     on 23 june 2016 i was outside looking at the stars and saw what i thought was an inbound aircraft as it had a red light on the right, to me appearing like a directional light.As a white light appeared to the left of the red one, i thought landing light immediately, but soon realized that it was not near bright enough.Now really focused on it, i noticed the flight path was appearing way to low . that's when it got really close and stopped.The white light moved slightly left,appeared to get stringy , then up and down it went. it is moving up and down rapidly making the actual shape hard to determine.
    now i am hollering for my son to come and see.He gets out on the porch in time to see it make a straight line exit to the right speeding up as it went.I was trying desperately to get pictures or a video, but not being as young as i was once nor any good with this small phone,i dropped the ball,no pics. the neighbor guys were sitting in their car while this was going on almost over top of them.When they came upstairs i ran to the door and asked them if they saw that?In my zeal to explain, i told one of them to come onto the  porch.I start yappin' about what i just saw, and he says, " you mean that there?  " yep ,came back over from our right, flew straight and level, stopped  , reversed direction and looked like it was sort of leaving vapory string behind as it went. but the leading spot got almost laser red as it increased in speed.It was surreal.
    so,forward to the night of july 2,2016. i am watching for sure now a lot. i see a few home fireworks rising and falling nothing to write home about. in the s w direction sits the old mound plant. they used to make nuclear triggers, now mostly things like thermo electric generators for  the cassini spacecraft etc. smart folks.
    in the far distance i see red lights starting to form a shape as it goes from far left to the right. now they form into what an art student would call perspective lines, and begin to travel to a distant point as they disappear.There were some small white lights as well. having called my son to see them, he arrived after they had nearly disappeared and did not see them. just before he got there, i took a picture in the direction they fadded into ( 11:13 pm) . not impressed at this one, he went back onto his computer. a few minutes later ( 11:17 pm)i spot a white light closer and higher up, so i take a picture but it disappeared quickly and i did not figure i had gotten  anything. boy was i wrong. disappointed i was going over the pictures, i did see something.When showing them to my son and the image was green ,i told him when i saw it was white, which it was.So i went into the phones image place and began messing with the color.That is when i realized there were images in the other photo, but not the one i thought i was taking a photo of.The question kept going thru my mind that my son asked me,why is it green? after looking at the photo of the street i noticed that some of the light was green some not, why ?  then it came to me, some lights are incandescent some are mercury vapor. in the one photo, it may just be me, but i think i  see counter rotation happening. when i took the photo all i saw was a white light momentarily move quickly and to the right and out.I believe it captures a transformation of matter or light itself into a cloaking phase shift.
   until next time, that's all i got...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw amazing sighting 23 june. was watching as lights formed , raced around, floated, appeared, disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
The week it happened was a more than strange week, i have taken alot of pictures of clouds, i love to its my hobby. never have i caught anything out of the ordinary til this one week and caught alot weird things on differant days in this week, but sadly havent see anything since. this is the first day of that week and hope to capture more in the future. traveling west on padden parkway to the i-205 north ramp for about 2 miles. i like to take pictures of clouds kind of a hobby of mine. (i hope saying this doesnt get me in trouble) while driving i pulled my cell phone out to take pictures of the clouds not taking my eyes off the road snapping pictures randomly hoping at least one would come out good later when i checked them and did this despite my girlfriends protests but told her "well im not texting or calling anyone so i dont think im technically breaking any laws". when going through my photos had almost deleted them until my girlfriend asked me "why arent you even gonna check them?" had replied "i dont know" in kind of a daze or my mind running on autopilot. before i could hit the delete button my girlfriend looking at the screen shouted "stop, dont do it. look, what is that" snapping back to reality i hit cancel and clicked on the picture i hadnt even looked at yet she was pointing to. what i saw shocked me, made me freeze in horror, i still get goosebump and a bit anxious/ nervous/ scared im not really sure how to describe the feeling it gives me. i clearly remember or at least think i know i never saw this thing with my own eyes, or at least wasnt visible to my eyes. and before any nay saying pay closer attention, its not something on my window or camera lens. because this thing followed in front of my truck changed direction, altitude, angle, and distance getting closer to me. i cant identify what it is, what it could be neither could anyone else, i have never seen anything like this before, and asked a few family members if they could but no one has any idea other than an extremely weird shaped flying weed whacker. or long armed/ tailed floating thing. 
below this part it asks what kind of picture, i dont know really anything technology so i hope im doing this all correct these are the original pictures unaltered and non-tampered. also the best way to reach me is by phone, i havent been able to figure out how to get into my emails in years cause as i said im not good with tech. and maybe now i can finally get some answers about this, thingy.
content.summary: I think its a lifeform, invisible to the eye but visible in picture.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed object hovering in the distance. too far away to tell exact shape but got to see it move in different directions before flying away at a high speed to the west. in the video there are other objects that weren't noticed until viewing the video frame by frame. about 3 hours later i took a picture of the progress we made that day working on my barn and there is another object in this picture to the west of us above the tree line.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Seen hovering, then a couple of zig zag moves. high speed leaving the area headed west

content.detailedDescription: While standing outside watching a storm come through i took a picture of the cool clouds. later that day i was showing the picture to my wife and saw the ufo in the picture. it was not noticed while taking the picture.
content.summary: Took a picture of a storm front coming in. ufo showed up in the picture.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south bound hwy 1.
2, very clear skys,beautiful evening,many points of light in large group,difficult not to see 15 degrees off horizon on my left 10 oclock. 3. no thinking,knew what i was looking at!
there were many orb shaped objects of various sizes,in a random grouping,appeared stationary.Took me 10 to 20 seconds to realize what i was seeing.I was driving in a 50 km zone no traffic near me,i slowed to about 10 to 15 km per hr watching the light orbs,about 30 seconds into sighting,%70 to %80 of the objects started moving to west ascending at a 5 to 10 degree angle from 1st observation,they moved what i would think to be about 1.5 miles then stop and hovered,other objects did not move from 1st sighting point.I pulled across highway and parked in mcdonalds parking lot,looking east the stationary group had 1 object with a regular pulsing that did not stop during entire observation,there were 6 to 8 other objects near to the blinking object that moved very little from the blinking object.The group of objects that moved are in a wnw direction from blinking object,the wnw group started moving and disappearing,some from the nwn group traveled fast enough to leave a light tail behind them and made 120 to 140 degree chanegs of direction and then disappeared,1 object from nwn group did not move and stayed stationary for about 10 minutes.At about 10 minutes into oberservation the east group and the object nwn moved towards a single point to the north fast enough to leave a light tail behind,the movement was very short and seemed to me to be an aggressive or threatening move!!!! after that there was not much movement but some objects very faint moved into view from time to time and some objects moved small distances slowly. close to the blinking object,100's of feet and slightly high,there was a dark object that had a different shape,kind of like a clingon battle cruiser!!!!! seems crazy,but it was there and looked that way!I ran out of time as i had someplace i needed to be and left. i took video,unfortunately after the nwn group had left! i realize now i should have took some stills! the object in the nwn group that did not leave blinked from time to time.The objects in the nwn group departed in what seemed random directions,they did not fly out of sight,they disappeared,i think mostly at the same time!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 30 to 40 orbs,2 blinking,1 dark object,5 to 7 objects stationary all others moving then disapper

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting outside when he noticed and showed me a large triangle object moving fast across sky and silent, no noise at all, moving se to nw just under constellation of scorpio at approximately 12:45 am july 7th 2016.  it was bigger and more wider triangle shaped than f15 or a 10s that fly around here often from the afb at mountain home.  this was much bigger and moved much faster but no noise and many more lights but lights were like as bright as the north star tonight roughly five on each side of a isosceles type triangle.
content.summary: Large isosceles triangle with dim white lights moving fast no sound large moving se to nw no contrail

content.detailedDescription: Driving on i43 from milwaukee to i90 at 1245am.We were between elkhorn and delevan.  out my right side of the windshield i noticed an orange glow in the sky flying towards us at about 3500 feet. i knew this was not a traditional aircraft and a ufo. we pulled our vehicle over to watch the unusual craft. just an orange glow, making no sounds at all.  it was not a helicopter or air plane. i turned my headlights on and off several times. i do not know why i did this, maybe to get its attention. it suddenly changed direction flying south. then suddenly changed direct again heading north east. it then accelerated to an incredible speed and vanished in the night horizon toward milwaukee. my son and i didn't even know what to say to each other. we were in shock, seeing something like this. we both said the same thing, " we just saw a ufo "
content.summary: Flying twoards our direct path, we pulled over and flashed headlights on vehicle

content.detailedDescription: Traveling home after spending the 4th of july in oregon with family, i spotted what i first thought to be an airplane on the horizon while traveling east bound on i-84 just outside of caldwell, idaho. as i watched the single orange colored light split into two separate lights almost at the same time two more appeared within close proximity, i asked my wife in the passenger seat of our suv if she saw it and then all 4 were gone. she then started poking fun until after a few miles she pointed another orange orb out to me.This time when it disappeared we spotted another light but it was pulsating like a strobe light. we were able to keep it in sight until we got close to boise and then lost it because of all the street lights.
content.summary: Several orange orbs on the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: The first time i saw it, was approximately 9:30 pm june fourteen 2016. in the western sky, about where the sun would be at 4:00pm i think.It was stationary in the sky no blinking. it looked like two stars very close side by side.Very bright .I went inside my apartment and came back out at 2:oo am . now it was in the southwest sky and looked like it was farther, not as visible but had same shape. this happened every night except a couple nights that it wasn't visible,over a 2 week period.I tried binoculars and i thought it looked like a dragonfly shape and gold color. my glasses made them difficult to use, so i didn't try again.The night of july 4, this was the second time i saw more than one and 3 of them made a triangle in the southwest.Tonight, at midnight i could see one in the west, two in southwest and looked like one was moving from southwest to east. low enough now to hear it and see blinking red lights on it. i watched till it disappeared in a cloud but could still hear it. now it's 1:31 am and i don't see anything.Altogether, i've had 3 witnesses besides myself. my grandaughter, one neighbor and a local policeman. not all on the same night. i  tried to take a picture but it didn't appear in any of the 3 photos i took with my phone.
content.summary: every night since mid june  looks like 2 stars side by side. first saw just one each night, 9pm-2am. now seeing 3 or more each night..

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck, i looked to the west in the sky and observed a light blinking very fast, like a strobe light slowed down toga of speed. it flew across the sky from nw to s very quickly, faster than any plane i've ever seen. at one point it slowed a little, veered se a little, then continued back s. very short experience, about 3-5 seconds, then it was out of view.
content.summary: Very fast-blinking light, moving ne to s way faster than any plane i've ever seen. at one point it slowed, veered slightly se, then continued toward s

content.detailedDescription:
On this day, i was heading back to town, from my delivery route, on rte 9. it was about 4pm or a little after when i saw a bright flash of light. the direction was over the towanda barnes road, but way up in the air.
after the flash, i saw a linear craft emerge, then turn face up, as if it was turning, then flattened back out nad into another bright flash of light.
when the thing turn face up, i got a pretty good look at it, there where ridges and shapes visable. the color of the thing was a dark brown.
now this is not the first event i have seen like this, this was the third in 2 months. the first happened over the northwest side of pontiac., then again as i was standing in my back yard in between these two.
all three had the flash of light and the a ssecond flash. nothing before the first one and nothing after the second one.
content.summary: It emerged from a flash of light, all i saw was a flat line until it turned. then flattened out into another flash of light.
